episodes.title: Weston Public Library Author Talk with Andrew LeCompte - Finding Miracles: Escape From a Cult
episodes.description:
Andrew LeCompte is an empathic communication skills teacher and master memoirist.  He  recently published two books, 'Finding Miracles: Escape from a Cult' and Creating Harmonious Relationships

During this presentation he shares his extraordinary journey from joining, recognizing and escaping a manipulative cult. He delves into his past, including teaching empathic communication and his intense spiritual search that led him to leave his family and move 2000 miles away. Over six years, he became deeply involved in the community, only to discover its cultish underpinnings and suffer significant personal and financial losses. His story culminates in his eventual recovery with the help of his son and new wife, his return to life, and his determination to share his experiences to warn others. This talk is essential for anyone interested in understanding cult dynamics, the importance of genuine interpersonal connections, and personal resilience.
